experience.title: Retail Sales Associate
responsibilities: Engaged with customers to provide personalized shopping assistance and product recommendations based on individual preferences.
Met and exceeded monthly sales targets by utilizing upselling techniques and maintaining extensive product knowledge.
Managed Point of Sale (POS) transactions, handled returns, and ensured the accuracy of the cash drawer at the end of shifts.
Collaborated with the visual merchandising team to organize floor displays and ensure a clean, inviting store environment.

experience.title: Sales Intern
responsibilities: Assisted senior sales staff in high-volume customer service scenarios during peak holiday seasons.
Executed inventory replenishment tasks to ensure all sizes and styles were consistently available on the sales floor.
Learned and applied basic conflict resolution skills to address customer concerns regarding pricing or product availability.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
